summary: Adds Balmor AllStones, a tough dwarf looking to show what a true dwarf is to Skyrim, instead of the Dwemer we compare them with.
descriptionHtml: Balmor is in the market place of Riften fresh in from hunting all over Tamriel. He\'s a tough two handed Berzerker as all Dwarfs are & heavy armor specialist. Not two bad a archer either as he is an accomplished hunter. He is a stand alone character and does not replace any Vanilla characters. SOOO if your looking for a butt kicking sidekick with a mean streak, bad breath and a unhealthy affection for ale, instead of a pin up barbie in her undies....here\'s your dwarf!
author: ThornJagger
